name: Rocket Science (TheJonu)
description:
It's a pretty challenging game in which you take the role of a spaceship pilot in a stellar mining corporation. Your job is to maneuver through rocks and reach extraction sites, all while avoiding damage to your ship. You also get the chance to upgrade your ship or buy new ones. Every ship has its own unique character and traits, and none is better than the others.

Gameplay and controls:
Explained inside the game. Only a mouse is needed.

Content:
In future updates I plan on adding:
- more difficulty levels, missions and ships
- different terrain types and a new environment
- the ability to invest in the exchange martket
- items for use inside missions, granting specific timed bonuses
- more resource types and secondary goals
